titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on optical fiber sensor, consisting of a 10 millimeter diameter lens built in an M14 screw feedthrough with 10-meter long fiber optic cable of 2.2 millimeter diameter.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/29/2008--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on optical fiber sensor, consisting of a 10 millimeter diameter lens built in an M14 screw feedthrough with 10-meter long fiber optic cable of 2.2 millimeter diameter.
